column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Marie - Thanks for your review. The Spicy Miso Tonkotsu Ramen is one of our more costly dishes due to the specialized miso paste that we use
column2: as well as the number of toppings and amount of pork that goes into this partcular bowl. As a franchise
column3: we don't create our recipes and must adhere to the ingredients and methods of preparation handed down to us by our Los Angeles headquarters. Regardless
column4: we are grateful for your continued patronage
column5: and we hope to serve you again soon.
